Scratch off the coating on the back cover of the paper textbook or learning card to reveal the activation code. Enter the code in the box below. The courseware needs to be activated under your own account - please do not activate for others! 1. After the class is archived, it will not be listed on your course screen.\n2. You cannot view the class progress after archiving;\n3. You cannot set study plans, assign homework, schedule exams, publish resources, etc. for the class.\n4. Students won\'t see the class\n5. The archived class can be restored by unarchiving. 1. After the practice, your last recording will be submitted and there will be traffic charges during the recording upload process. It is recommended that you practice when Wi-Fi is connected. 2. You can practice when you are offline. But your recordings cannot be uploaded. After you are online, click the Synchronize Learning Records link to upload your recordings and learning records.

Your role in the course is %s You can manage the classes, students, and teaching team members of this course. You can add/teach a class. You can also add teacher(s) and/or TA(s) to co-teach a class. After the course ends:\nTeachers cannot add new resources or activities, nor can they edit the existing content in the course. They can only view and export data from the web version ULearning. \nStudents can continue to view the course content. Enrolling the course is turned off. \nAre you sure you will end the course? After you withdraw the course, your assignments, discussions, exams, and other records of the class will be cleared. The courseware learning records will not be affected. Are you sure you want to withdraw? Are you sure to clear the cache files of the selected course? Failed to withdraw! You have successfully withdrawn the course. If you want to join a new class, please ask the teacher for the QR code or class code of the new class.
You have successfully submitted the class withdrawal application. Please wait for the teacher to process. You can cancel the application before approval. After deleting, the course cannot be restored, and students who have joined the course will not be able to continue learning - Please be cautious! The course administrator or teacher will assign a class for you. You can assist the teacher in teaching. The course admin may assign you a class, or you can create a class in the course to start teaching. Create classes, assign teachers, and invite students to join the class (or can also be done by each class teacher) Please create your own class or wait for the course admin to assign a class for you
Please wait for the course admin to assign a class for you. Or, you can enter the course directly. For courses co-taught or co-managed by a team, only one course needs to be created.
